attributes.long-description:
Take to the sky-high tracks with speed and precision in Aero Racer, which challenges your reflexes and daring across 25 levels in Grand Prix, Challenge and Quick Race events. Drive like a true prodigy by mastering advanced drifting and wall-boosting techniques to get an edge over your opponents and achieve record times. Aero Racer is intense action from the green light to the finish line! 25 high-speed tracks Over 60 individual Challenges with multiple race objectives 5 Grand Prix events with four difficulty levels Quick Race mode to jump straight to your favorite track.
